summary: Remove terser dependency from worker package.json once webpack is updated to a version that no longer requires it as a separate dependency.
userImpact: Reduces build dependencies and maintenance overhead for the TypeScript SDK worker package.
rootCause: Terser was added as a workaround dependency in #760 pending webpack version updates.
proposedFix: Remove terser from packages/worker/package.json once webpack is updated.
resolutionDetails: Terser dependency was removed after webpack was updated to a version that handles it automatically.
keyQuote: Once webpack updates and we update our webpack version, we can remove terser from packages/worker/package.json
